attributes.action: Review and remove the section in the Coroner's & Justice Bill that will allow the State to intervene making some Inquests secret.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This kind of Law has no place in British Legal files and opens the door to even more corruption than we already have.

It is clearly intended to allow illegal killings by authorities to be covered up and stop Public awareness and therefore, Justice.
